channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: There was a group of counsellors, Cllr Jessica Webb, volunteer Ellie,Cllr Christopher Kennedy, was seen on 03/08/25 at 14:37pm in Merriam Ave, garages E9 5NE observing looking at a member of public,residence private paperwork, property items laying on the floor discarded from a vehicle theft or robbery which has been discarded inbetween the garages out of sight of the metropolitan police commissioners camera. The councillors did not take any action or report this. Councillors turn a blind eye but they were not to know it was connected with a robbery. Councillors just looked at it like someone's dumped their rubbish which is not the case. This is a victim of crimes property. This behaviour has been witnessed time and time and again authority and safer neighbourhood police do nothing. This has been repeatedly going on for a number of years criminal activity what is the councillors doing about this you have seen with your own eyes now what action are you taking. You want people to vote for you but you do not serve the community in this anti-social behaviour and criminal activity which you have witnessed and seen the evidence. This is not the first time there is multiple victims over the last couple of years property being discarded out of stolen vehicles. Where is a large group of residents involved in criminal activity who live on the Trowbridge estates. I do not have much hope in the councillors or authority because they do nothing.They are lazy and competent people and do not deserve to serve the community. leave residents,tenants to suffer this anti-social behavior.The evidence and facts are laying in front of you. Do your jobs and your duties you signed up for and serve your community., 3rd August
item.description:
There was a group of counsellors, Cllr Jessica Webb, volunteer Ellie,Cllr Christopher Kennedy, was seen on 03/08/25 at 14:37pm in Merriam Ave, garages E9 5NE observing looking at a member of public,residence private paperwork, property items.ASB

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Merriam Avenue, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly-tipped items beside refuse area (supposedly with CCTV) on alleyway leading to neptune close, 3rd August
item.description:
Yet again, a large amount of Fly-tipped rubbish beside refuse area on galleon close/Neptune walk alleyway. There are names and addresses amongst the items, and the area is supposedly covered by CCTV. SECOND TIME IN 2 WEEKS this area has been dumped on. Consider putting up enforcement cameras!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Galleon Close, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet
